roleset.name: die
roleset.note: CROAK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'croak' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from croak.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example, and misparsed at that
example.text: ``If they croak stocks like that,'' he said, it presents an opportunity that is ``the kind of thing you dream about.''
